nodes.text: Intense Performer was a painting available in the galaxy during the Galactic Civil War. It depicted the Twi'lek entertainer Anj'a performing her number one galactic hit "Booombaaa Boombaa Bombashella" at the outdoor theater on Vreni Island on the planet Corellia. Sometime after the Battle of Yavin, copies of the painting were given out by the Human Matilda Carson in the city of Mos Eisley on the planet Tatooine to any and all who asked for one.

Intense Performer appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies as a painting the player could use to decorate their home. The painting's artwork also appeared in the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game expansion set Threat of the Conqueror as an "Ability" card called Intense Performer. It was added to the games in 2010 as part of a contest for players to have their artwork and its description added to the games. Intense Performer's artist is a player known as Anj'a. Only the painting's artwork appeared in Threat of the Conqueror while a description of the painting appeared along with it in Star Wars Galaxies.
